manipulation_analysis.explanation: The hiker has new, clean boots that look like they just came from the store because they are so clean and shiny. When you go hiking, your boots get dirty.

inferred_original_state.description: The hiker on the right would have worn hiking boots that looked used and dirty, showing that they had been worn on a hike before.

inverse_edit_instructions.Effect: Revert the hiker's footwear to appropriate hiking gear.
Explanation: The hiker on the right's boots
Change the hiker's boots to used, appropriate hiking boots with dirt and wear.
